derivation: or (feminine) מְצוּדָה; or מְצֻדָה; for H4685 (מָצוֹד);
outline:
1. net, prey, net prey
    1. net
    2. prey
  2. fastness, stronghold
kjv_def: castle, defense, fort(-ress), (strong) hold, be hunted, net, snare, strong place.
strongs_def: a net, or (abstractly) capture; also a fastness
